item.title: Adversarial Schr√∂dinger Bridge Matching
item.description: Accelerate Schr√∂dinger Bridge Matching with Discrete-time IMF using only a few steps, achieving comparable results to existing hundred-step methods via D-GAN implementation.

item.title: Mutual Information Estimation via Normalizing Flows
item.description: Researchers introduce a novel approach to mutual information (MI) estimation using normalizing flows, providing accurate estimates even in high dimensions.
